creator: mydroid
descriptionHtml:
Control TV and all electronic instruments with your mobile phone using the remote control app. All smart TV remote control is a universal TV remote app that is very useful for you whenever you cannot find your TV remote. We are introducing one of the popular universal remote control apps for smart TV. Now monitor television and all other electronic gadgets using universal TV remote app.

The only setting required to connect your mobile phone and your Smart TV or devices is to connect to the same network. It will convert your phone into a smart TV remote.

Use smart as a controller for TV using IR of your phone. An infrared (IR) feature is required to send signals from phone to TV so your device is works like a common remote TV.

It is a simple and easy to use universal remote control for TV and many more electronic equipment. Now the mobile phone has become an important instrument that everyone keeps with them, so having an application on your device that works as a remote control is essential for mobile. All TV remote app can be used for all brands of TVs, you can say this is a universal remote for any TV.

Most advanced and latest smart TV universal remote control and universal TV remote app for all countries. If your original remote control is not properly working you can use this smart TV remote control application to watch your favorite news channel or sports channel. Smart TV universal remote control supports both IR and smart TVs of all brands so you do not need to download ac remote control and TV remote apps separately, just install universal TV remote app to control all devices with smartphone.

Smart Remote TV Functions :

TV remote universal app for all devices.
Supports almost all brands of TV.
Search favorites channel quickly.
Click on button to turn ON/OFF smart TV.
Use high and slow volume button to control volume.
Easily connect mobile phone with TV.

Main Features Smart TV Universal Remote Control:

Instantly detect smart TV on same internet or WIFI.
Easy comfortable touchpad for content navigation and menu.
Works with all popular TV brands.
Simple and easy understandable user interface.

How to Use Smart TV Universal Remote Control App:

Install TV remote control app
Select your device like Ac, AVR, TV, Set Top Box etc.
Select the TV brand from available list.
Select remote for your required device.
Tap on button appear on device screen.
Tap on Finish button: Remote control is ready now.

Important Note:

Your phone or tablet required IR blaster if your device does not have IR sensor it works with WIFI. Make sure your smartphone and smart TV must be connected to the same internet connection.

Feedback:

Universal TV remote and smart TV app is compatible almost with all models/brands however if you face any problem in connection "Email us" we will make availability of your TV brand as soon as possible. Download smart TV remote free and make your device universal remote.
descriptionShort: Universal remote control app to control your smart TV over WIFI, IR with mobile.

creator: mydroid
descriptionHtml:
Universal TV Remote Control and Smart TV Remotes App for All Countries. Universal Remote is a free application to control all smart TV functions very easily.

Useful & Easy to Manage
It is always good and easy to use a single universal remote control for TV to control all your electronic equipment. As mobile phone has become a major gadget that people always carry with them, having an application installed on your mobile device that works as a TV remote control will make your life easier.

Watch your favorite Channel
Just right before one of your favorite TV seasons or shows is about to start, OR your favorite sports game is about to begin, OR you want to watch the news and your TV remote is not within your reach then try this universal TV Remote for all TV app. It converts your smartphone into a universal TV remote. You just need to press the channel key to change channels and watch your favorite one.

Supported Control Smart TV Brands
Almost all famous TV brands support this universal smart remote like LG TV, Samsung TV, Sony TV, Panasonic TV, and many more.

Screen Mirroring for all TV
The screen mirroring feature will provide you the facility to mirror your phone's screen on the smart LED. You can easily shift your mobile display on the big screen of your smart TV. Now play movies or videos on your phone and enjoy watching them on your smart TV screen through the screen mirroring feature. Now you don’t need to connect a cable to the phone to display, all you need is to connect your smartphone and smart TV on the same network.

Universal Smart TV Remote Control operates using a Wireless network or Infrared (IR Blaster) from your device for controlling each and every function of your television or any other electronic device. TV Remote is an app that converts your Android device into a universal TV remote control.

Top Features of Universal TV Remote:-
* Power ON / OFF Control button
* Volume UP / Down Control
* AV / TV
* Mute / Un-Mute
* Channel Digits buttons
* Menu Button with up / down and left / right control
* Channel index and lists
* Red / Pink / Yellow / Green (Multiple purpose keys)
* Control all smart TVs

Universal remote control for TV
This is the best remote control unit for Roku TV. You will be able to control the playback of your content, run apps on Roku, and enter text. A large touchpad will make navigation through the menu and content incredibly handy. You will be able to adjust the volume of your Roku smart TV and switch your favorite channels.

Important Note
Enjoy using the TV remote control app! Don’t forget to leave your positive comment and tell us about your TV remote and TV brands to which you want to be added to our universal remote app. Thanks

With TV Remote Universal Controller, you can now forget about struggling with multiple remotes for different appliances and electronics. This smart Remote Control TV technology works with popular smart televisions. All you need to do is connect your phone and Smart TV to the same Wi-Fi network, and you’re good to go.

Mirror Your Phone Screen Instantly:📺
Take screen sharing to a whole new level using Android Remote App: Screen Mirroring feature. Now, you can easy shift your phone screen’s display to your television and enjoy it in a more immersive way, thanks to the Android Remote App: Screen Mirroring. You can easily relish streaming images, videos, or even presentations on a bigger screen.

Universal Compatibility:🎛️
You can use the Universal Remote TV Controller with virtually any brand or make of television set. You can use the Smart Remote Control TV without difficulty. This TV Remote Universal Controller is perfectly configured so that no matter what your device’s model or make is, you can always control it with ease.

Quick Setup Design:🚀
Alike any other smart device, a user does not need to be tech friendly to use the Universal Remote TV Controller. Thus, the ease and responsiveness of the design makes it one of the best for new learners. The Smart Remote Control TV configuration allows an effortless switch to volume control or launching the home screen features.

Enhanced Performance for Android Devices:📲
Turn your Android device into the ultimate portable gadget with Android TV Remote: Control For TV. Declutter your life because the Android TV Remote: Control For TV allows you to stream both screen mirroring and remote control functions into a single tap.

Get Started With Your Universal TV Remote Controller Today!

Effortlessly manage your channel selection with the Android Remote App: Screen Mirroring. Everything comes handy in your pocket whether you are using it with Smart Remote Control TV functionality, TV Remote Universal Controller or default Android TV Remote: Control For TV. Your universal TV solution has arrived now with the Universal TV Remote Controller.
